    Publications

    Highlighting our most impactful research in artificial intelligence, machine learning, and medical imaging.

    Featured Publications

    Rapid prediction of earthquake ground shaking intensity using raw waveform data and a convolutional neural network
    D Jozinović, A Lomax, I Štajduhar, A Michelini
    Geophysical Journal International 222 (2), 1379-1389 (2020)

    Semi-automated detection of anterior cruciate ligament injury from MRI
    I Štajduhar, M Mamula, D Miletić, G Uenal
    Computer Methods and Programs in Biomedicine 140, 151-164 (2017)

    Deep learning for feature extraction in remote sensing: A case-study of aerial scene classification
    B Petrovska, E Zdravevski, P Lameski, R Corizzo, I Štajduhar, J Lerga
    Sensors 20 (14), 3906 (2020)

    The augmented radiologist: artificial intelligence in the practice of radiology
    E Sorantin, MG Grasser, A Hemmelmayr, S Tschauner, F Hržić, V Weiss, et al.
    Pediatric Radiology 52 (11), 2074-2086 (2022)

    A pediatric wrist trauma X-ray dataset (GRAZPEDWRI-DX) for machine learning
    E Nagy, M Janisch, F Hržić, E Sorantin, S Tschauner
    Scientific Data 9 (1), 222 (2022)

    Detection of non-stationary GW signals in high noise from Cohen’s class of time–frequency representations using deep learning
    N Lopac, F Hržić, IP Vuksanović, J Lerga
    IEEE Access 10, 2408-2428 (2021)

    Transfer learning: Improving neural network based prediction of earthquake ground shaking for an area with insufficient training data
    D Jozinović, A Lomax, I Štajduhar, A Michelini
    Geophysical Journal International 229 (1), 704-718 (2022)

    Local-entropy based approach for X-ray image segmentation and fracture detection
    F Hržić, I Štajduhar, S Tschauner, E Sorantin, J Lerga
    Entropy 21 (4), 338 (2019)

    Fracture recognition in paediatric wrist radiographs: An object detection approach
    F Hržić, S Tschauner, E Sorantin, I Štajduhar
    Mathematics 10 (16), 2939 (2022)

    XAOM: A method for automatic alignment and orientation of radiographs for computer-aided medical diagnosis
    F Hržić, S Tschauner, E Sorantin, I Štajduhar
    Computers in Biology and Medicine 132, 104300 (2021)

    …there are more, but we could not list them all.

    For more info & our publications, please check out these lists:

    Open Datasets

    We contribute to open science by sharing datasets and code:

    • kneeMRI Dataset: Medical imaging dataset for knee MRI analysis
    • GRAZPEDWRI-DX Dataset: Pediatric wrist trauma X-ray dataset
